abstract: Texas Rangers have had little pizazz in their history, but consecutive World Series appearances have changed that.
snippet: Since their time as the Washington Senators, the Texas Rangers have had little pizazz in their history. But consecutive World Series appearances have changed that.
lead_paragraph: Since their time as the Washington Senators, the Texas Rangers have had little pizazz in their history. But consecutive World Series appearances have changed that.

headline.main: Slowly Making a Name for Themselves
headline.print_headline: Slowly Making a Name for Themselves
headline.seo: Texas Rangers, Via Washington, Have Slowly made Name for Themselves
